column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Coming into the establishment I noticed the music was very loud and it was hard to make conversation. It took 40 min to get a table which is understandable because of the brunch rush. Our server was Terry M. And wasn't the greatest. First off he wasn't very friendly
column2: just asked what we wanted and left
column4: but he was chatting and making jokes with the table next to us
column5: even dancing a bit too. He hardly came by and checked up on us
column6: but he would check up on the table next to us frequently. The mediocre service really brought down the whole experience and Couldn't really enjoy the food because of it.
